Welcome to the products and services provided by "Learning"!

Learning (or "we") knows the importance of personal information to you. We have always promised to protect users (hereinafter collectively referred to as "user" or "you") Personal information and privacy security.
When you use your learning service, we may collect and use your relevant personal information (or "personal information").

"Learning Privacy Policies" (hereinafter referred to as "this privacy policy") is suitable for us to provide learning through -learning services. Users who are under 18 years of age apply for this policy and the "Learning Personal Information Protection Rules and Guardian Instructions for the Prosperity of the Underage".

We hope to explain to you through this policy that we correspond to the processing rules corresponding to your personal information, as well as the way we provide you with access, correction, delete and protect these personal information in order to better protect your rights and interestsEssence

The first preface
1.1 Study through the development and operation of Beijing Century Super Star Information Technology Development Co., Ltd., we attach great importance to the protection of user personal information.
1.2 When you use the service provided by the learning platform, the learning pass may collect and use your personal information because of actual business needs.

Learning Tong hopes to clearly introduce you to the processing method of your personal information (including but not limited to the collection, use, and protection of personal information) to you through this privacy policy. Please read it carefully. When neededGuide, make a choice you think is appropriate.

1.3 When you log in to use the learning hook, you need to select all the contents of your privacy policy, and agree to learn about the collection, use and protect your relevant personal information in accordance with this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Checking requires all the contents of accepting this policy, and agree to learn to collect, use and protect your relevant personal information.

text: Article 2 of the collection and use of information

You understand and agree that learning through the collection information is to provide you with better services. We will only collect the information necessary for business functions according to the principles of legal, correctness, and necessary.Personal information and non -necessary information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will only collect information necessary for business functions based on the principles of legal, legitimate, and necessary.

text: When learning the service provides services, it may be collected, stored, and uses the following information related to you:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2.1 Account Registration
First, you need to register a account to become a learning user.

(1) Personal user registration: When you register, you need to provide us with your own mobile phone number. At that time, we will verify that your identity is valid by sending a SMS verification code.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the mobile phone number provided by individual users to verify the identity to help register.

text: If you belong to a teacher, then when you apply for a school training from your learning pass, the system will automatically fill in the mobile phone number registered when you register.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: When teachers and users apply for school training, the system will automatically fill in the mobile phone number.

text: Mobile phone numbers are sensitive information, but based on national laws and regulations, the real -name system requirements and account security protection needs of the national laws and regulations. If you do not provide this information, some functions will not be used normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Do not provide a mobile phone number will cause some functions to be unavailable normally.

text: (2) Unit user registration: Unit user registration needs to provide personal names, login account (school number/work number) for the unit to manage and statistics. The information required for registration is collected and entered by the unit manager and completed the account registration.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect personal names provided by the unit users, login account (school number/work number) for the unit to manage and statistics, and complete account registration.

text: Unit users use the unit information registered by the unit to log in to the use of learning through learning, and provide the mobile phone number for account binding by themselves (after binding, the unit user can use the mobile phone number to log in and repay the password).

First Party Collection Information

text: 2.4 When you use the service of the learning pass, the learning pass may automatically collect the following information and store it as a service log information.

First Party Collection Information

text: 2.4.1 Equipment information.

Equipment models, operating systems and versions, client versions, device resolution, package name, equipment settings, processes and software lists, device identifiers (MAC/IMEI/Android ID/idfa/Openudid/Guid/SIM card IMSI information)), Software and hardware feature information, the location of the device where the device is located (IP address, GPS location, and WLAN access point, Bluetooth and base station sensor information, equipment hardware serial numbers, equipment unique identification code, and software installation list.
2.4.2 Software information.
Software version number, browser type.
To ensure the security of the operating environment or provide services to provide services, learning will collect information about mobile applications and other software you use.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect information about mobile applications and other software you use to ensure the security of the operating environment or provide service needs.

text: Please note that separate equipment information and software information cannot identify the identity information of specific natural persons.

If we use this type of non -personal information with other information to identify a specific natural person, or use it with personal information, during the combination of use, such non -personal information will be regarded as personal information.

Important

text: Article 3 The use of cookies and similar technologies
3.1 We or our third -party partners may obtain and use user information through cookies or similar technologies, and store the information as a log information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: By using Cookies, we provide users with a simple and rich and rich network experience.
A cookies are a small amount of data, which are sent from a network server to the user's browser and there are computer hard disks.
We use cookies to make users benefit.
For example, in order to make the login process of learning passing faster, users can choose to exist in a cookies.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Users can choose to have a cookies in a cookies for quick login.

text: In this way, the next time the user wants to log in to the service of the learning pass, it can be more convenient and fast.
Cookies can help us determine the pages and contents of the user connection, and users spend time on learning service and the learning communication services selected by users.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: Cookies enables us to serve users better and faster.
However, users should be able to control whether cookies and how they are accepted by browsers.

text: Users can check the files attached to their browser to obtain more information in this area.

text: We and third -party partners may collect and use user information through cookies or similar technologies, and store the information.
